item.title: Example Speaker
item.description: After copying this file or its content and adjusting the front matter above, everything below this line (and this line aswell) can be deleted and replaced with content about the author.

item.title: Jakob Gaj≈°ek
item.description: Jakob has been active in the startup community since 2015, when he co-founded the startup accelerator ABC where he was in charge of further raising funds for the accelerator portfolio. In 2018, he took over the position of Executive Director of the Ljubljana University Incubator, where he focused on creating a new generation of startups that emerge from research.
